description: Eisenstein series E_16(q) (alternate convention E_8(q)), multiplied by 3617.
references: N. Koblitz, Introduction to Elliptic Curves and Modular Forms, Springer-Verlag, 1984, see p. 111.
J.-P. Serre, Course in Arithmetic, Chap. VII, Section 4.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Eisenstein series
maple: E := proc(k) local n,t1; t1 := 1-(2*k/bernoulli(k))*add(sigma[k-1](n)*q^n,n=1..60); series(t1,q,60); end; E(16);
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
